Message to encrypt locally in your brows: Message to encrypt locally in your browser
Checkbox for toggling manual decryption: Checkbox for toggling manual decryption key input
The decryption key is randomly generated: The decryption key is randomly generated by default. You can optionally set this value manually.
The encrypted message will be deleted au: The encrypted message will be deleted automatically after
This secret might not be viewable again,: This secret might not be viewable again, make sure to save it now!
Downloading file and decrypting in brows: Downloading file and decrypting in browser, please hold...
Make sure to download the file since it: Make sure to download the file since it is only available once
Yopass is created to reduce the amount o: Yopass is created to reduce the amount of clear text passwords stored in email and chat conversations by encrypting and generating a short lived link which can only be viewed once.
Encryption and decryption are being made: Encryption and decryption are being made locally in the browser. The key is never stored with yopass.
Encrypted messages have a fixed lifetime: Encrypted messages have a fixed lifetime and will be deleted automatically after expiration.
The encrypted message can only be downlo: The encrypted message can only be downloaded once which reduces the risk of someone peaking your secrets.
Yopass generates a unique one click link: Yopass generates a unique one click link for the encrypted file or message. The decryption password can alternatively be sent separately.
Sharing should be quick and easy; No add: Sharing should be quick and easy; No additional information except the encrypted secret is stored in the database.
Yopass encryption mechanism are built on: Yopass encryption mechanism are built on open source software meaning full transparency with the possibility to audit and submit features.
A decryption key is required, please ent: A decryption key is required, please enter it below
Remember that the secret can only be dow: Remember that the secret can only be downloaded once so do not open the link yourself.
The cautious should send the decryption: The cautious should send the decryption key in a separate communication channel.
File upload is designed for small files: File upload is designed for small files like ssh keys and certificates.
It might be caused by any of these reaso: It might be caused by any of these reasons.
A secret can be restricted to a single d: A secret can be restricted to a single download. It might be lost because the sender clicked this link before you viewed it.
The secret might have been compromised a: The secret might have been compromised and read by someone else. You should contact the sender and request a new secret.
The link must match perfectly in order f: The link must match perfectly in order for the decryption to work, it might be missing some magic digits.
No secret last forever. All stored secre: No secret last forever. All stored secrets will expires and self destruct automatically. Lifetime varies from one hour up to one week.
